adDetails: * Hourly/Local moves, Long distance moves, Piece moves * Complete packing & Un-packing services * Truck with moving pads & Equipment * Courteous and Friendly staff * On- time pickup, Loading and Unloading * Simple disassembly and Reassembly of your furniture * Transportation to and from your residence * Furniture/Electronics rearrangement * Very competitive prices * Door to door pick up & Delivery * Use of wardrobe boxes to hang your clothing * Time stars at moving stuff and ends upon completion of your move * Free sofa & Mattress covers * Free blanket wrap * Free dolly, hand truck & tools * Professional Movers, Fast, and Safe!!! Multiple insurance protections: $2,000,000 General Liability Insurance, $750,000 Auto Insurance, $1,000,000 Workers Comp Insurance, and $20,000 cargo insurance.
